content:
# List of intents.
[
    {
        "intentId": " RSinst7541",
        "intentName": "RequestSoftwareInstallation",
        "intentDescription": " a formal or informal communication from an individual or department within an organization to the IT support team. In this request, the sender is asking for assistance in installing a specific piece of software on their computer or a designated system.",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "SofWN1031",
                "slotName": "SoftwareName",
                "slot_description": "indicates specific software's actual name the user wants to install.",
                "type": "String "
            },
            {
                "slotId": "Ver31201",
                "slotName": "Version",
                "slot_description": "refers to a specific release or iteration of a software program.",
                "type": "String "
            },
            {
                "slotId": "Vend34350",
                "slotName": "Vendor",
                "slot_description": "the company or entity that develops, sells, or distributes the software, provides customer support, and releasing updates or new versions.",
                "type": "String "
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "RTEsc5610",
        "intentName": "RequestTicketEscalation",
        "intent_description": "User needs to escalate or raise the priority of an existing IT incident ticket",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "TNumS4621",
                "slotName": "TicketNumber",
                "slot_description": "the unique identification number of the IT incident ticket that the user wants to escalate.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Project Code + Numeric Ticket Number",
                    "Alphanumeric Ticket Number"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "PLev2016",
                "slotName": "PriorityLevel",
                "slot_description": "the desired priority level to which the user wants to escalate the IT incident ticket",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Low",
                    "Medium",
                    "High",
                    "Critical"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "TSDat006",
                "slotName": "TicketSubmittingDate",
                "slot_description": "Date when the initial ticket was submitted",
                "type": "String ",
                "possibleValues": [
                    "dd-mm-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-dd-mm",
                    "mm-dd-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-mm-dd"
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": " HW095r94",
        "intentName": "HardwareRequest",
        "intentDescription": "Requests for a new piece of hardware (physical devices). To be used only if there is an explicit request for hardware present, not if a user just says a piece of hardware doesn't work. ",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "hWty080934",
                "slotName": "HardWareType",
                "slot_description": "refers to the physical components of a computer system or electronic device. These tangible parts can be seen and touched, and they work together to enable the device to function",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "mouse",
                    "cable",
                    "laptop",
                    "phone",
                    "motherboard",
                    "USB",
                    "keyboards",
                    "monitor",
                    "printer",
                    "scanner",
                    "headphones"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "hwNa0155",
                "slotName": "HardWareBrand",
                "slot_description": "refers to the company or manufacturer that produces physical components or devices, often related to technology and electronics.",
                "type": "String "
            },
            {
                "slotId": "hwMo5434",
                "slotName": "HardWareModel",
                "slot_description": "a specific version or configuration of a physical device or component produced by a manufacturer. It is a unique identifier that distinguishes one variant of hardware from another within a product line.",
                "type": "String "
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "CIq57930",
        "intentName": "ConcurInquiry",
        "intentDescription": "User has an inquiry or concern about the Concur system. ",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "InT739049",
                "slotName": "InquiryType",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the type of inquiry or concern the user has within the Concur system.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "SystemConcern",
                    "TravelExpensing",
                    "BusinessPurchases",
                    "TravelBooking",
                    "ExpenseReports"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "EXCat4792",
                "slotName": "ExpenseCategory",
                "slot_description": "specifies the relevant category related to expensing travel costs or business purchase..",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "TravelCosts",
                    "BusinessPurchases"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "TrBo00023",
                "slotName": "TravelBooking",
                "slot_description": " specifies the type of travel being booked, if the inquiry involves booking business travel ",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Flight",
                    "Hotel",
                    "CarRental",
                    "Other"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "CSIss1839",
                "slotName": "ConcurSystemIssue",
                "slot_description": "specifies the type of the issue encountered while using the Concur platform ",
                "type": "String "
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "LCSup65",
        "intentName": "LaptopCameraSupport",
        "intent_description": "User needs assistance with the configuration, setup, or troubleshooting of their laptop camera or is experiencing issues with the camera during meetings",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "CanIss213",
                "slotName": "CameraIssue",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the nature of the issue the user is facing with their laptop camera..",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Setup",
                    "Configuration",
                    "Not Working",
                    "Other"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "MeetPl76",
                "slotName": "MeetingPlatform",
                "slot_description": "Indicates the virtual meeting platform where the user is encountering camera issues",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Zoom",
                    "Microsoft Teams",
                    "Skype",
                    "Other"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "OpSys42",
                "slotName": "OperatingSystemS",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the user's laptop operating system to tailor support based on the platform.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Windows",
                    "macOS",
                    "Linux"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "ErMes6201",
                "slotName": "ErrorMessage",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the user's laptop operating system to tailor support based on the platform.",
                "type": "String "
            }
        ]
    }
]

Utterance.

"I'm writing to seek clarification and guidance regarding the submission of an expense report through the Concur platform. My name is Garry Porter, I'm a new employee since January 2021 and I firstly, had issues with registering my account in the system. Secondly, But when finally I got in, I'm feeling lost in its UI.  I was on a business trip to San Diego and I need help in submitting my expense reports. It is imperative that I submit them in a timely manner. I have difficulties with attaching receipts and inability to allocate expenses correctly. 
Could you please provide the assistance on how to resolve these issues promptly?"

Instructions:

You are an IT support system that helps to prioritize the incoming employees requests. You should read the utterance and define the best intent that it matches. You can choose only one intent. Also, extract all relevant slots and their values. 
All intents are provided in json format. 
Each intent has a unique ID associated with it that contains an upper case letters, numbers and lower case letters in a random combinations.
For each intent there are also slots associated with them.  Each slot will have a name, datatype, and description.  It may also include a field PossibleValues which means the slot must match one of the provided values. If any other values are present in the utterance, do not extract them, return "none" as the key value for the slot. If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots.
I want you to give your final output as a JSON.  The JSON should always have a key “output”.  The value of “output” should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a subdictionary where the keys are the slot ids associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values. If you return your answer using slotNames you'll be punished.
